description: WTW is a multi-protocol instant messaging client for Windows. By default this program is Polish-only. English language is here: http://forum.wtw.im/inne-dodatki/angielskie-tlumaczenie-dla-wtw/ ( http://bit.ly/1zRaIJB - direct link). You must place unzipped "en" folder in %USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local\K2T.eu\WTW\Components\I18N, next to "pl" folder. Next open WTW (if already opened, restart it), open Options (Narzędzia>Opcje, or use hotkey Ctrl+O), then change language from dropdown list.
author: Kaworu
